title: Manage a Patient's Care Team
description: A care manager needs to add a new home health nurse to a patient's official care team.

tasks.description: Open the patient's record and navigate to the care team section.
tasks.expected_outcome: Care manager finds the list of current care team members.

tasks.description: Search for the home health nurse in the provider directory.
tasks.expected_outcome: The nurse's provider record is found.

tasks.description: Add the nurse to the care team with the role of 'Home Health Nurse'.
tasks.expected_outcome: The care team is updated, ensuring all members have access to the shared care plan and can communicate securely.
